summary: Remove required signatures of protected branch
description: When authenticated with admin or owner permissions to the repository, you can use this endpoint to disable required signed commits on a branch. You must enable branch protection to require signed commits.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description: This API is under preview and subject to change.

previews.name: zzzax
previews.note:
Protected Branches API can now manage a setting for requiring signed commits. This feature is currently available for developers to preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2018-02-22-protected-branches-required-signatures) for full details. To access the API during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.17/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.zzzax-preview+json

```
